name: Daughters of Memory
description:
The Muses have something to tell you, will you listen? Talk, pay tribute, and enjoy a calming, lost island swimming in the stars. Reflect upon human nature, history, space, and time.

WASD to move, Shift to sprint, E to interact, Q to exit dialogue, M to reset the game, ESC to exit the game

Unzip the folder and open the Daughters of Memory .exe or .app file.

Created by @SomeSaltyGames and @necropocene.
